titles.title: A resolution expressing the sense of the Senate that the number of justices of the Supreme Court of the United States should remain at 9.
A resolution expressing the sense of the Senate that the number of justices of the Supreme Court of the United States should remain at 9.

action.text: Referred to the Committee on the Judiciary.

bill.summary: This resolution opposes any attempt to expand the number of justices on the Supreme Court.
